Entries.Introduction: Hmm? A stranger? Well, hey! My name's Vincent.#$b#My momma always told me not to talk to strangers, but you seem okay, heheh.$h
Entries.Resort_Entering: Awesome! I'd love to drive a boat some day...
Entries.Resort_Shore: Heh... you think there's any sharks here?$h#$e#No, no, I'm convinced. There *is* a shark in here. It's just invisible.
Entries.Resort: If you look close, you can see little bugs jumping out of the sand.$h
Entries.reject_869: Oooh! Nice find!#$b#I dunno why, but I kinda feel like someone else should have it. Thanks anyways, though!
Entries.Mon: Sam is really cool... who wouldn't want to be like him?#$e#He gets all the girls, too. Lucky guy.
Entries.Mon4: $d kent#I'm glad Dad's back... but he's different than I remember...$s|Dad's not around much... I miss spending time with him.$s
Entries.Tue6: Hey, you wanna hear a secret, @?$u#$b#I think I'm gonna marry Miss Penny when I grow up.#$e#Just don't tell her, okay?$u
Entries.Wed: I'd love to go looking for bugs, but mom'll be really mad if I track a bunch of drink into the house.$u#$b#Hopefully she won't be too mad when I do it anyways.
Entries.Thu: I'm hungry... when's Mom gonna make something to eat?$s
Entries.Thu2: I dunno why, but farm life seems pretty interesting to me.#$b#Interesting, but also, fun! I'd love to get covered in dirt, and then afterward, I get something to eat!$h
Entries.Fri: #$c .3#Eugh, it's boiled beet night again...$s#$e#Oh no... Mom's making lentil soup tonight.$s
Entries.Sat_1: Dad's coming back soon!#$b#I hope he's got some good stories.$u
Entries.Sat: Miss Penny makes me read a new book every week. That's ridiculous, right?!$s#$b#At least she lets me pick them, sometimes! She won't let me read gorey ones, though. I wish she didn't baby me so much.
Entries.Sat8: $d kent#Dad seems weird since he came back. I knew he'd be shaken up, but...$s#$b#He's really distant. It... sucks.$s|I wonder if Dad will ever come home...$s
Entries.Sun10: Hey, @!#$e#Psst... guess what? I think you're really cool.#$b#Okay, that's all. Bye.$h
Entries.GiftReaction_Dinosaur_Egg: Is that a real dinosaur egg?! Cool!$h
Entries.rejectNPCA: I... no, no, you're not supposed to do that...$s
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Aren't you supposed to do that with someone you know? And... someone who isn't a kid?$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: Married?!$3#$b#Why would I marry an old man like you?$s^Sorry, I've got my eyes on Miss Penny.$s
Entries.engageA: Are you trying to kidnap me? Mom gave me something to defend myself with.$2
Entries.marriedB: I was taught to run away from people like you. I'm not as stupid as I look.$3
Entries.birthdayLoveB: This is such an awesome birthday present.$1#$b#Thank you so much!$l
Entries.birthdayLikeA: Yay! I got a birthday present!!$1
Entries.birthdayLikeB: Thanks a bunch, mister!$h^Thanks a bunch, miss!$h

Vincent.4: Uhh... I guess I could do something with this.

Entries.winter_16.000: I'm gonna ride that boat! Don't even try to stop me!$h
Entries.spring_11.001: %Vincent is in deep focus. He has his eyes closed and is taking long, careful breaths.
Entries.spring_11.000: ...I have to get my shots today, but I think I'm gonna be able to get through it.#$b#I figure if I just ignore everything around me, I'll forget I'm even in a hospital, so I won't be scared!$h

Entries.Tue6: Hey, @, you wanna hear an embarrassing secret?$u#$b#Heh... alright, I used to have crush on Miss Penny.#$e#I know, I know, it's stupid. I figured you'd find it funny, though.$u

Entries.Phone_Ring_Vincent: Hello?#$b#Uhh... this is Vincent.$3#$b#...$3#$b#Umm... so, farming hard or hardly farming, right?$h#$b#...$3#$b#Okay I gotta go! *click* $3

Entries.Vincent: When does the egg hunt start?! I'm ready to kick some butt!$h
Entries.Vincent_y2: I'm gonna get so many eggs this year... mmm, but now I'm hungry for scrambled eggs.
Entries.Penny: It's a lovely day out, don't you think? I'm sure the egg hunt will be lots of fun for everyone.
Entries.Penny_y2: Hopefully Vincent will be able to find a good amount of eggs this year...#$b#He's not very good at it, but he has the spirit.

Entries.Vincent: Who says boys can't be flower queens, huh? I'll be the floweriest queen who ever lived!$h
*yawn* Jas keeps asking why I'm not dancing. Why's she gotta nag me so much?

Changes.LogName: Vincent 13 dialogue - Dance of the Moonlight Jellies

Entries.Vincent: Aha! There it is, the rare green jelly!
Must not climb onto cow... must not ride cow through town hollering like a cowboy... control yourself, Vincent!
I'm only allowed to go in the maze if I take Jas with me... b-but what if I get scared? I don't want her to see that...$s
Mmm... I just saw a *really* big fish, and now I'm hungry.

Changes.LogName: Vincent 13 dialogue - Feast of the Winter Star

Entries.Vincent: Mmm... Mama says I should be more patient to get my presents.$s#$b#I guess it's not *too* hard to wait... there's plenty of good food!

BeforeMovie.Text: ...Are you sure? The movies where it's just a guy saying stuff usually annoy me...$s

DuringMovie.Text: Wait... hang on, nature is really cool!$h

AfterMovie.Text: That surprised me! I guess it makes sense... I like going outside and rolling around in the mud.$h

BeforeMovie.Text: I'm really excited! Let's get some candy... just don't tell Mom!$h

DuringMovie.Script: message "Vincent is having a great time!"

AfterMovie.Text: That was great! Let's go see another movie together sometime!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: ...This one looks scary. *gulp*$s#$b#I'll try my best to be brave!$h

DuringMovie.Script: /message "Vincent is managing to keep it together... barely."
DuringMovie.Text: Ghh... c'mon, I shouldn't be this scared! I'm {{OmegaFallon.ThisTooShallPassCS/VincentAge}}!$s

AfterMovie.Text: Mmm... I guess I'm not ready for scary movies yet.$s

BeforeMovie.Text: Uhh... this movie is for adults, isn't it?$s

DuringMovie.Script: /shake Vincent 250/pause 500/shake Vincent 250/pause 500/emote Vincent 28/message "Vincent is fidgeting in his seat."

AfterMovie.Text: Mmm... sorry, @, I didn't really get that one.$s
